div.h1: NYS Extends School Closure Through May 15

div.p: On April 16, Governor Andrew Cuomo extended the school closure for all New York schools through Friday, May 15 in an effort to slow the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19).
If we receive any further updates, we will make sure to share them with our community.
